ygData.subject: RE: Question about Augmentation and Rune series.  Also Feedback.
ygData.msgSnippet: Q, I have gotten one successful research of tepid deeds, and it s sitting in my bank account. I have two copies of page 9 of Velishouls if you need them. Pages
ygData.messageBody:
Q,

I have gotten one successful research of tepid deeds, and it's
sitting in my bank account. I have two copies of page 9 of Velishouls
if you need them.

Pages 23 and 24 are now trivial for me (whee! Progress!), not sure
about 26, but I know 30 still gives me skill.

I think I might have one copy of page 17 also, I can check this
evening.

G.

--- HiFi Review <hifireview@...> wrote:
> From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
> I haven't managed to get any of the level 24
> reserach spells and I am
> quickly approaching 29. Do any of you on E'ci have
> extra copies of the
> 24 spells to trade or sell? I have a couple higher
> level velishouls I
> could ytrade for the lower.
>
> Thanks,
>
> Quentin
>
